tools.name: get_all_locations
tools.description: Get all travel locations for the authenticated user. Returns a list of all visited locations including RV parks, national parks, and other travel destinations.

tools.name: get_all_national_parks
tools.description: Get a list of all US national parks in the database. No authentication required.

tools.name: get_locations_by_date_range
tools.description: Get all locations visited within a specific date range. Useful for reviewing trips during a particular time period.

tools.name: get_location_count_by_state
tools.description: Get a count of locations grouped by US state. Shows how many places have been visited in each state.

tools.name: get_visited_national_parks
tools.description: Get all national parks that the authenticated user has visited. Requires authentication.

tools.name: get_location_by_id
tools.description: Get details of a specific location by its ID. Requires authentication and user must own the location.

locationId.description: The unique identifier of the location

tools.name: get_locations_by_state
tools.description: Get all locations in a specific US state. Useful for viewing travel history in a particular state.

tools.name: get_national_parks_by_state
tools.description: Get all national parks in a specific US state.

tools.name: get_national_park_by_id
tools.description: Get details of a specific national park by its ID and state code.

parkId.description: The unique identifier of the national park

state.description: Two-letter US state code where the park is located

tools.name: send_message_to_chatbot
tools.description: Send a message to the AI travel assistant and get a response. The chatbot can answer questions about your travel history, locations visited, and provide travel recommendations. Requires authentication.

message.description: The message or question to send to the chatbot

threadId.description: Optional thread ID to continue an existing conversation

lastMessageDate.description: Optional timestamp of the last message in the thread

tools.name: get_current_time
tools.description: Get the current time (UTC and local).

tools.name: get_forecast
tools.description: Get weather forecast for a specified location point
